title: Girls in the Hell
description:
A twisted yuri anthology by Kawai Rou.

Contents:
1) Lilism Kyōsōkyoku (Lilism Frenzy)
2) My Little Red Riding Hood
3) Shota Girl
4) Nisemono Drop (Fake Drop)
5) Boseki ni Love Song (A Love Song for a Tombstone)
6) Lovely Melanchloy Distortion
7) Girls in the Hell
8) Ama Koji de Tamagoyaki (Ama Koji Omelettes)
9) Mahou ja Tabako wa Kaemasen (Magic Can't Buy Cigarettes) (https://mangadex.org/title/39431/magic-can-t-buy-cigarettes)
10) Momo ga Waruin Dakara (This is Your Fault, Momo)
11) Watashi wa Nee-san to wa Chigau Dakara (I'm Different From You, Nee-san)
12) Tatoeba, Eien Nantemono ga Nakatta toshite (What If Nothing Was Forever)
